title: Family Freakouts! Farrah Slams ‘B***h’ Mother & Kendra’s Mom Calls Her A ‘W***e’
text:
Yes, please sign me up to receive The Daily Juice Privacy Policy send Family Freakouts! Farrah Slams ‘B***h’ Mother & Kendra’s Mom Calls Her A ‘W***e’ It's all going down on 'Marriage Boot Camp Reality Stars Family Edition.' Posted on Mar 23, 2017 @ 13:44PM 
Reality TV’s worst monster moms are going head to head with their daughters like never before on this season’s Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars Family Edition. 
Teen Mom Farrah Abraham has previously claimed that her mother, Debra Danielson , beat her so bad as a child that she had “cuts, bruises, welts, swelling and scars.” (Danielson denies her allegations.) 
And in a shocking new video from the upcoming episode, the 25-year-old former Teen Mom star slams her mom in a heated screaming match caught on-camera, calling her a “stupid dumb b***h!” 
PHOTOS: Cheating, Drugs & Violence: Inside ‘Teen Mom’s 10 Nastiest Splits
